title: S13 Ep10: The Most Gruesome Hauntings of the Midwest
itunes:title: The Most Gruesome Hauntings of the Midwest
description:
Beyond The Darkness welcomes Author Chad Lewis in to explore the Midwest's most gruesome haunted locations that are cursed by murders, tragic accidents, suicides, untimely deaths, mob hits, and serial killers.

PLUS: A brand new THEATER OF THE MIND!

https://www.amazon.com/Most-Gruesome-Hauntings-Midwest/dp/0982431457/ref=sr_1_6?ie=UTF8&qid=1515728867&sr=8-6&keywords=chad+lewis+book

https://www.chadlewisresearch.com/
